definitions.definition: The inedible parts of a grain -producing plant.
examples: To separate out the chaff , early cultures tossed baskets of grain into the air and let the wind blow away the lighter chaff .

definitions.definition: Straw or hay cut up fine for the food of cattle.
Any excess or unwanted material, resource, or person; anything worthless .
Loose material, e.g. small strips of aluminum foil dropped from aircraft , intended to interfere with radar detection .

main_definition: The inedible parts of a grain -producing plant.
secondary_definitions: Straw or hay cut up fine for the food of cattle.
( figurative ) Any excess or unwanted material, resource, or person; anything worthless .
( military ) Loose material, e.g. small strips of aluminum foil dropped from aircraft , intended to interfere with radar detection .
